title: Natsume Yuujinchou
alternative_title: Natsume's Book of Friends, 夏目友人帳
description: Natsume Takashi has the ability to see spirits, which he has long kept secret. However, once he inherits a strange book that belonged to his deceased grandmother, Reiko, he discovers the reason why spirits surround him. Containing the names of these spirits, a binding contract was formed between the spirits and the owner of the book. Now, Natsume is determined to free the spirits and dissolve the contracts. With the help of a spirit cat, his days are filled trying to return the names to these spirits.
genre: [<Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Shoujo>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
